description:
Ready for the test of time, made of shop-quality chromoly steel, this wrench has both 15mm and 9/16in. opening.

  • 32cm long
  • 15mm and 9/16in. wrench flats (found on some older bikes with one piece cranks)
  • Round vinyl dipped handle won't dig into your hand like flat ones do
name: Park Tool PW-3 Pedal Wrench
